name: Pipe Dreamer
description:
Z to shoot beam to posses other creatures or use their abilites (only two of them have abilities).

X to stop possessing the creatures.

DISCLAIMER: The game is now more polished with a myriad of bug fixes and changes to graphics. I would like to leave the game alone so I can focus on other game projects, but you are free to criticize the game and report any bugs or graphical errors.

Done for the First Game Summer Jam 2017 https://itch.io/jam/my-first-game-jam-summer-2017

Game by: PrownieBrownieSoft (Hamza Salih)
